title: 李飞飞全新“世界模型”诞生，单机H100生成实时3D永恒世界
titleZh: 李飞飞全新“世界模型”诞生，单机H100生成实时3D永恒世界
titleEn: Fei-Fei Li's new "World Model" emerges, generating real-time 3D eternal worlds with a single H100
descriptionEn: One image, one 3D world! Today, Fei-Fei Li's team released the real-time generative world model "RTFM," which learns from large-scale video data end-to-end and directly generates new viewpoint images of the same scene from input 2D images. Notably, it requires only a single H100 GPU to render a persistent and 3D-consistent world in real time.

title: 谷歌×耶鲁联合发布抗癌工具：AI推理精准瞄准“看不见”的癌细胞
description: 近日，谷歌与耶鲁大学联合发布的大型模型C2S-Scale首次提出并验证了一种新颖的“抗癌假说”。
titleZh: 谷歌×耶鲁联合发布抗癌工具：AI推理精准瞄准“看不见”的癌细胞
titleEn: Google × Yale Jointly Release Anti-Cancer Tool: AI Reasoning Precisely Targets "Invisible" Cancer Cells
descriptionZh: 近日，谷歌与耶鲁大学联合发布的大型模型C2S-Scale首次提出并验证了一种新颖的“抗癌假说”。
descriptionEn: Recently, the large model C2S-Scale, jointly released by Google and Yale University, proposed and validated a novel "anti-cancer hypothesis" for the first time. This achievement demonstrates that large models can not only replicate known scientific laws but also possess the ability to generate new, verifiable scientific hypotheses.

title: AI为梅西撰写比赛报道：体育记者要失业了吗？
description: 体育记者继续坚守阵地的根本原因是人工智能写作在实际应用中仍然存在不足，粉丝自然对人工智能生成的内容保持警惕。
titleZh: AI为梅西撰写比赛报道：体育记者要失业了吗？
titleEn: AI Writes Match Reports on Messi: Are Sports Reporters Losing Their Jobs?
descriptionZh: 体育记者继续坚守阵地的根本原因是人工智能写作在实际应用中仍然存在不足，粉丝自然对人工智能生成的内容保持警惕。
descriptionEn: The fundamental reasons sports reporters continue to hold their ground are that AI writing still falls short in practical applications and fans naturally remain wary of AI-generated content.

title: 科技巨头走不同的“开源”人工智能之路
description: 开源将人工智能竞争从“单点技术战”转变为“长期生态系统战”，巨头们比的不是“参数数”，而是“产业实施能力”。
titleZh: 科技巨头走不同的“开源”人工智能之路
titleEn: Tech Giants Take Different Paths to "Open Source" AI
descriptionZh: 开源将人工智能竞争从“单点技术战”转变为“长期生态系统战”，巨头们比的不是“参数数”，而是“产业实施能力”。
descriptionEn: Open source transforms AI competition from "single-point technology battles" to "long-term ecosystem wars," where giants compete not on "parameter counts" but on "industrial implementation capabilities."
